strapiPost.title: Sip, Shop, And Sing At The First-Ever Gathering At Johnson Bottoms
strapiPost.content:
Grab your lawn chairs and picnic blankets and get ready to celebrate the beginning of summer at the first-ever Gathering at Johnson Bottoms, set for Jun 1 from 6-9p.

  • Family fun: Eat your fill of Wright's Barbecue and sip a coffee from Bethel Brew while shopping from several local vendors like Olive Trunk Boutique, while the kids enjoy activities like a fun zone sponsored by Lewis Automotive, a fire truck with water guns provided by Johnson Fire Dept, and a giant sand pile.
  • Celebrate others: Johnson Bottoms was started by four local business owners with the desire to celebrate the hard work and creativity of other small businesses and create experiences that foster a more deeply connected community.

Stay up to date with Johnson Bottoms on Facebook and Instagram, and learn more about the Gathering HERE.
